column4: Hi folks. I want to disable a login promptl to tty1 when Ubuntu starts up in console mode. I've commented out the following line "#1:2345:respawn:/sbin/getty 38400 tty1" but my computer still starts up with a prompt to tty1. Anything else I should do?
And the answer is: Fiddle with the file /etc/init.d/tty1
what version dapper or edgy? i would think that would work but with new init system in >=edgy not sure
